trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" /> namespace provides advanced two-dimensional and vector graphics functionality.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" /> fornisce funzionalità di grafica vettoriale e bidimensionale avanzate.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists some of the important classes and enumerations in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace, grouped into categories.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencate alcune delle enumerazioni nelle classi importanti di <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> dello spazio dei nomi, raggruppata in categorie.

trans-unit.source: Class category
trans-unit.target: Categoria di classe

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Dettagli

trans-unit.source: - Graphics and Graphics paths
trans-unit.target: -Grafica e percorsi grafici

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> classes report information about the current `Graphics` object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> classi forniscono informazioni sulle corrente `Graphics` oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> classes represent a series of lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> le classi rappresentano una serie di linee e curve.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathData> classes provide detailed information about the contents of a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathData> classi forniscono informazioni dettagliate sul contenuto di un <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: - Matrix and transformation related types
trans-unit.target: -Matrice e la trasformazione di tipi correlati

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> class represents a matrix for geometric transforms.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> classe rappresenta una matrice per la trasformazione geometriche.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> enumeration specifies the order for matrix transformations.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> enumerazione specifica l'ordine per le trasformazioni di matrice.

trans-unit.source: - Brush classes
trans-unit.target: -Classi di pennelli

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> classes enable you to fill shapes with either a gradient, or hatch pattern, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> classi consentono di riempimento di forme con una sfumatura o motivo a tratteggio, rispettivamente.

trans-unit.source: - Enumeration related to lines
trans-unit.target: -Enumerazione correlati alle righe

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> enumerations enable you to specify cap styles for a line.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> enumerazioni consentono di specificare gli stili di estremità di una riga.

trans-unit.source: The, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin> enumeration enables you to specify how two lines are joined in a path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin> Enumerazione consente di specificare come due righe vengono uniti in un percorso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> enumeration enables you specify the alignment of the drawing tip, when you draw a line.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> enumerazione consente di specificare l'allineamento del disegno suggerimento, quando si disegna una linea.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> enumeration specifies the pattern a line should be filled with.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> enumerazione specifica il modello deve essere compilata con una riga.

trans-unit.source: - Enumerations related to filling shapes and paths
trans-unit.target: -Enumerazioni riferite al riempimento di forme e tracciati

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration specifies fill styles for a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumerazione specifica gli stili di riempimento per un <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> class specifies a blend pattern for a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> classe specifica un motivo di blend per un <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode> enumeration specifies the fill style for a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode> enumerazione specifica lo stile di riempimento per un <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.

trans-unit.source: Classes in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace are not supported for use in a Windows or [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: Classi di <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> dello spazio dei nomi non sono supportati per l'utilizzo in Windows o [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] servizio.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes in one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Tentativo di utilizzare queste classi in uno di questi tipi di applicazioni può generare problemi imprevisti, ad esempio eccezioni delle prestazioni e in fase di esecuzione del servizio ridotto.
